A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Its been a week now since i've seen the movie and i still cannot believe that my favorite movie franchise has been raped so hard!
I really dont know where to begin what wrong with the movie.
The story is so weak\, there is absolutly no character development\, forced humour\, forced feminism\, it is all so\, so\, so bad!
Star wars can do alot of things wrong but at the end it always gave me a good feeling. 
But after this movie i just felt empty\, asking myself how it is possible to ruin this fantastic franchise. 
I'm done! Not even interested in ep 9
